item.title: About
item.dc:creator: mark65fa942b6d3
item.content:encoded:
Who are we?

Our Mission

We want small business owners to take their minds off the stresses of running a social media page. As an up-and-coming business, or simple wanting to expand in new directions, you should be able to focus on what matters most to you and let us take care of the rest.

At Stop Drop & Scroll, we take the time to understand your message, target audience, and goals, allowing us to create custom strategies that resonate with your customers and your business or startup.

With collective years of experience managing a wide variety of pages, our team has the foundation as to what will make you grow. We have worked one-on-one with large companies before and now we want to extend our services to you! When working with us, you will get professionalism in a welcoming and effective way, perfect for elevating your business's reach and impact.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: mark65fa942b6d3
item.content:encoded:
Services

Photography

Our photography service covers a diverse range of subjects and settings, intending to capture our clients' photos as precisely as possible to their needs. Our team has experience shooting events, such as parties and sports games, portraits, themed shoots, candid, and even abstract. Whatever your vision is, we strive to make it come to life.

https://stopdropscrollco.wpcomstaging.com/the-greekish-food-final-m4v/https://videos.files.wordpress.com/46tIRmUU/the-greekish-food-final.m4vhttps://videos.files.wordpress.com/46tIRmUU/the-greekish-food-final.m4v

Videography

Our cinema team is well-versed in capturing stunning visuals for a wide array of projects. Whether you're an artist looking for a captivating music video, a sports enthusiast needing exhilarating highlight reels, or a couple seeking breathtaking coverage for your special day, we've got you covered. We excel at filming dynamic concerts, shows, while crafting engaging footage for casual or advertising purposes. With our expertise and passion for storytelling, we bring your vision to life with impeccable execution.

Editing

Our editing service is designed for individuals with a passion for photography and videography who desire that extra touch of perfection. Whether you are new to editing and lack experience, seek a professional touch, or simply find yourself short on time, our editing service is tailored to meet your needs. Our team is well-versed in a wide range of editing styles, themes, and techniques, ensuring that we can provide the aesthetic and finishing touches that align with your vision.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: mark65fa942b6d3
item.content:encoded:
Discover a world of possibilities

Learn more

Welcome to a world of limitless possibilities, where the journey is as exhilarating as the destination, and where every moment is an opportunity to make your mark on the canvas of existence. The only limit is the extent of your imagination.

Navigating life's intricate fabric, choices unfold paths to the extraordinary, demanding creativity, curiosity, and courage for a truly fulfilling journey.

<label> Your name [text* your-name autocomplete:name] </label>
<label> Your email [email* your-email autocomplete:email] </label>
<label> Subject [text* your-subject] </label>
<label> Your message (optional) [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Submit"] 1 [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] <wordpress@stopdropscrollco.wpcomstaging.com> mark@stopdropscroll.co From: [your-name] [your-email] Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This is a notification that a contact form was submitted on your website ([_site_title] [_site_url]). Reply-To: [your-email]
[_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] <wordpress@stopdropscrollco.wpcomstaging.com> [your-email] Message Body: [your-message]
-- This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message. Reply-To: [_site_admin_email]
Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. Please fill out this field. This field has a too long input. This field has a too short input. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The uploaded file is too large. There was an error uploading the file. Please enter a date in YYYY-MM-DD format. This field has a too early date. This field has a too late date. Please enter a number. This field has a too small number. This field has a too large number. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. Please enter an email address. Please enter a URL. Please enter a telephone number.
